text:
"Chip 'n Dale Rescue Rangers" is an animated Disney television series. The series was originally shown from March 4, 1989 to November 19, 1990. It had a total of 65 episodes.
Video Chile: ADV Garantía Original Video.
Thirteen VHS cassettes contaning 26 episodes of the series were released on Argentinina/Chile.
International.
The Argentinina/Chile DVD releases was as the American release separated into three discs but has seven remaining episodes removed the third collection remains unaltered.
